entry.sentence: Suddenly , Lilly 's head sank to the side as if she had fallen asleep .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (ADVP (RB Suddenly)) (, ,) (NP (NP (NNP Lilly) (POS 's)) (NN head)) (VP (VBD sank) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (NN side))) (SBAR (RB as) (IN if) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD had) (VP (VBN fallen) (S (ADJP (RB asleep)))))))) (. .)))

cc(lost-4, Or-1) dep(lost-4, had-2) nsubj(lost-4, she-3) root(ROOT-0, lost-4) dobj(lost-4, consciousness-5)

entry.sentence: Andrea resolutely took out her cell phone and dialed the number of the rescue center .

entry.sentence: She briefly explained the case and indicated which of the parking lots for hikers in the Rhine meadows she would wait at with the sick child .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (NP (PRP She)) (ADVP (RB briefly)) (VP (VP (VBD explained) (NP (DT the) (NN case))) (CC and) (VP (VBD indicated) (SBAR (WHNP (WDT which)) (S (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN parking) (NNS lots)) (PP (IN for) (NP (NP (NNS hikers)) (PP (IN in) (NP (DT the) (NNP Rhine) (NNS meadows))))))) (NP (PRP she)) (VP (MD would) (VP (VB wait) (PP (IN at) (PP (IN with) (NP (DT the) (JJ sick) (NN child)))))))))) (. .)))
entry.deps: nsubj(explained-3, She-1) nsubj(indicated-7, She-1) advmod(explained-3, briefly-2) root(ROOT-0, explained-3) det(case-5, the-4) dobj(explained-3, case-5) conj_and(explained-3, indicated-7) dobj(wait-21, which-8) det(lots-12, the-10) nn(lots-12, parking-11) prep_of(wait-21, lots-12) prep_for(lots-12, hikers-14) det(meadows-18, the-16) nn(meadows-18, Rhine-17) prep_in(hikers-14, meadows-18) nsubj(wait-21, she-19) aux(wait-21, would-20) ccomp(indicated-7, wait-21) prep(wait-21, at-22) pcomp(at-22, with-23) det(child-26, the-24) amod(child-26, sick-25) pobj(with-23, child-26)

entry.sentence: He was to be taken to Elisabeth Hospital .

entry.sentence: There was certainly no one left in the toy paradise at this time , and Andrea did not know the private number .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (S (NP (EX There)) (VP (VBD was) (ADVP (RB certainly)) (VP (ADVP (RB no) (NP (CD one))) (VBN left) (PP (IN in) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN toy) (NN paradise)) (PP (IN at) (NP (DT this) (NN time)))))))) (, ,) (CC and) (S (NP (NNP Andrea)) (VP (VBD did) (RB not) (VP (VB know) (NP (DT the) (JJ private) (NN number))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: So she called the police , where she learned that a missing person 's report had already been filed for little Lilly Phillips .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (IN So) (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD called) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN police)) (, ,) (SBAR (WHADVP (WRB where)) (S (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD learned) (SBAR (IN that) (S (NP (NP (DT a) (VBG missing) (NN person) (POS 's)) (NN report)) (VP (VBD had) (ADVP (RB already)) (VP (VBN been) (VP (VBN filed) (PP (IN for) (NP (JJ little) (NNP Lilly) (NNP Phillips))))))))))))) (. .)))

entry.sentence: With the child in her arms , she made her way to the trailhead parking lot .
entry.parse: (ROOT (S (PP (IN With) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN child)) (PP (IN in) (NP (PRP$ her) (NNS arms))))) (, ,) (NP (PRP she)) (VP (VBD made) (NP (PRP$ her) (NN way)) (PP (TO to) (NP (DT the) (JJ trailhead) (NN parking) (NN lot)))) (. .)))
